DOC.brief_summary: The propose study registry patient treat primary angioplasty acute myocardial infarction . The aim registry define outcomes patient treat acute , ST-segment myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) community hospital without on-site cardiac surgery program complete C-PORT Primary Angioplasty Development program . The primary medical outcome registry combine incidence death , recurrent non-fatal myocardial infarction stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Patient Outcomes Research Team Primary PCI Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The primary study endpoint composite incidence death , non-fatal reinfarction stroke 6 week index myocardial infarction . Secondary endpoint include : 1. composite death , recurrent non-fatal MI stroke hospital discharge 6 month 2. specific subgroup analysis plan base history diabetes age anterior versus infarct location race gender 3. incidence complication include significant bleeding , need coronary artery bypass surgery , cardiac arrest
DOC.criteria: 1. age > 18 year 2. ability give inform consent 3. acute myocardial infarction 1 . > 30 min ongoing ischemic cardiac pain presentation > 0.1 mv STsegment elevation 2 contiguous ECG lead 2. new suspect new LBBB 3 . > 0.1 mv STsegment depression V1 V2 consistent true posterior infarction 4. rescue PCI fail thrombolytic 5. cardiogenic shock ( define systolic blood pressure < 80 mmHg sustain 30 minute despite correction nonmyocardial factor ( hypovolemia , acidosis , arrhythmia , etc ) requirement pressor and/or IABP sustain systolic blood pressure > 80 mmHg ) Exclusion Criteria 1. inability obtain informed consent ( surrogate consent may obtain approve IRB )
